channel.title: Colouring or new theme to a JFrame and menubar?
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i166.photobucket.com/albums/u116/the_owner2007/menubaretc.jpg[/img]
Is there a way to change that? Because i was looking at someone elses jframe etc, theirs was black etc.
Thanks, please point out the main componants or whatever, thanks.

item.title: Colouring or new theme to a JFrame and menubar?
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9

and i couldnt copy and paste…
[/quote]
This must be a first in about a century, when a moparscaper could not copy and paste.[/quote]
Sigged!!!

item.source: Colouring or new theme to a JFrame and menubar?

item.title: Colouring or new theme to a JFrame and menubar?
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

I stole ric914’s black theme class file for ju. ima attatch it to this post.

In your main class file, add these:

MetalLookAndFeel.setCurrentTheme(new BlackTheme());
import theme.BlackTheme;
import javax.swing.plaf.metal.MetalLookAndFeel;

And put the file i r attaching into a folder called theme and called the file BlackTheme.

Read full topic
item.source: Colouring or new theme to a JFrame and menubar?

item.title: Colouring or new theme to a JFrame and menubar?
item.dc:creator: @super_OLDACCOUNT super_OLDACCOUNT
item.description:
@super_OLDACCOUNT wrote:

[quote=“VB7 Rocks, post:4, topic:195968”][quote author=BAsh(CntLgn) link=topic=260522.msg2160896#msg2160896 date=1207374192]
See: http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/javax/swing/UIManager.html
and in particular: http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/javax/swing/LookAndFeel.html
[/quote]

There’s not really a setBorderColor method or anything in those, though.

I’m interested in doing this as well, could you maybe be a bit more specific, ie, give an example of how it’s done?[/quote]

UIManager.put(“windowBorder”, SystemColor.BLACK);

i think, p.s. SystemColors extends Color so you can access all of Color’s public members

Read full topic
